component.name: NewPipe (unofficial port)
component.summary: Free and lightweight YouTube frontend for Android

description.p: **This is an unofficial and experimental Flatpak build based on Android Translation Layer. It is not assembled by TeamNewPipe, and it is neither affiliated with nor endorsed by TeamNewPipe. Please report bugs to the ATL bug tracker instead of the NewPipe bug tracker: https://gitlab.com/android_translation_layer/android_translation_layer/-/issues.**

NewPipe is a privacy-preserving YouTube frontend. NewPipe does not use any Google framework libraries, or the YouTube API. It only parses the website in order to gain the information it needs. Therefore this app can be used on devices without Google Services installed. Also, you don't need a YouTube account to use NewPipe, and it's FLOSS.
NewPipe currently supports these services:

screenshot.caption: Start page showing trending videos on YouTube
Video detail page showing infos and offering to play or download the video
Search page allowing to search media content name
Play queue allowing to play media content in background as audio only stream
Channel detail page showing all videos of one channel
Video detail page with dark theme
Channel detail page with dark theme

description.p: [YouTube] Added support for more channel URL formats
[YouTube] Added support for more video metainfo formats
Fixed resuming streams at the last playback position #13195
**Hotfix release**

This hotfix release fixes the "Content not available" error that prevents YouTube videos from being played: #13082. It also fixes a few regressions that slipped through with 0.28.1: #13072 #13031 #13040 #13046.
Add support for Android Auto (special thanks to @haggaie!) #9592 #12044 #12416 #12410 #12412
Add feed groups as main screen tabs #12325
[YouTube] Support new kiosks and add migration to change trending kiosk tab #12450
[YouTube] Share as YouTube temporary playlist #12065
[SoundCloud] Add support for likes in channel and feed #12367
[SoundCloud] Add support for AAC 160k unprotected stream TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1317
This hotfix release fixes YouTube only providing a 360p stream #12126 #12134 TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1297

Note that the solution employed in this version is likely temporary, and in the long run the SABR video protocol needs to be implemented, but TeamNewPipe members are currently busy so any help would be greatly appreciated! Take a look at #12248 for more information.
This hotfix release fixes various YouTube issues
This hotfix release fixes YouTube videos not loading due to the error "IOS player response is not valid", see Issue #11934 and Pull Request TeamNewPipe/NewPipeExtractor#1262.
This is a minor release made to allow the new APK to be reproducible for F-Droid, see v0.27.3 for the previous release notes
This version also includes the changes from NewPipe Extractor version v0.24.3.
This hotfix release fixes HTTP 403 errors in the middle of YouTube videos.
